$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/readme.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/readme
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/readme.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/ThemeTweaks/ <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> 本插件实现了TiddlySeq主题的主体部分，包括样式，以及一些小组件。@@color:red;请搭配[[Vanilla主题|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla]]使用！@@ !! 设置 本主题尽可能地沿用了Vanilla主题的设置，所以大部分主题设置位于[[Vanilla主题设置|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/themetweaks]]中。其余的设置列在下面：
|[[StoryRiver下边界|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StoryBottomMargin]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StoryBottomMargin" placeholder="比如：28px" tag="input"/> | |[[条目间隔|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StorySpacing]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StorySpacing" default="https://source.unsplash.com/random" placeholder="如：3px" tag="input"/> | |[[标题栏毛玻璃效果|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurTitleBackground]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurTitleBackground" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[菜单栏毛玻璃效果|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurMenubarBackground]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurMenubarBackground" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[隐藏侧边栏标题|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarTitle]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarTitle" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[隐藏侧边栏副标题|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSubtitle]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSubtitle" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[隐藏侧边栏页面控制图标组|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarPageControl]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarPageControl" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[隐藏侧边栏搜索框|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSearch]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSearch" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> |
<$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> This plugin implements the main part of the TiddlySeq theme, including styles, and some widgets. @@color:red;Please use it with [[Vanilla theme|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla]]!@@ !!! Settings This theme follows the settings of the Vanilla theme as closely as possible, so most of the theme settings are located in [[Vanilla theme settings|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/themetweaks]]. The rest of the settings are listed below.
|[[Bottom margin of story river|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StoryBottomMargin]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StoryBottomMargin" placeholder="e.g. 28px" tag="input"/> | |[[Spacing of tiddlers|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StorySpacing]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/StorySpacing" placeholder="e.g. 3px" tag="input"/> | |[[Title bar hairy glass effect|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurTitleBackground]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurTitleBackground" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[Menu bar hairy glass effect|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurMenubarBackground]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurMenubarBackground" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[Hide sidebar title|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarTitle]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarTitle" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[Hide sidebar subtitle|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSubtitle]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSubtitle" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[Hide sidebar page control icon group|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarPageControl]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarPageControl" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> | |[[Hide sidebar search input|$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSearch]] | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/HideSidebarSearch" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="yes"/> |

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/style/Button.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/style/Button

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/style/Menubar.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/menubar]is[tiddler][$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/menubar]get[text]else[no]!match[yes]]">
.gk0wk-menubar-background-box {
  background: <<colour page-background>><$reveal state="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurMenubarBackground" type="match" text="yes">DD</$reveal>;
  height: 237.5px;
  position: fixed;
  top: -200px;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  z-index:849;
  display: none;
  border-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tiddler-border>>;
<$reveal state="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/BlurMenubarBackground" type="match" text="yes">
  backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
</$reveal>;
<$reveal state="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout" type="match" text="fluid-fixed">
  width: calc(100%<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no"> - {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth}}</$reveal>);
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout" type="nomatch" text="fluid-fixed">
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="match" text="no">
  width: 100%;
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/state/sidebar" type="nomatch" text="no">
  width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright}};
</$reveal>
</$reveal>
}

@media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) {
  div.gk0wk-menubar-background-box {
    display: block;
  }
}

nav.tc-menubar {
  pointer-events: none;
}

nav.tc-menubar .tc-menubar-item {
  pointer-events: auto;
  display: inline-block !important;
}

nav.tc-menubar > .tc-menubar-wide .tc-menubar-item {
  height: 37.5px;
}

nav.tc-menubar > .tc-menubar-wide > ul.tc-menubar-list {
  padding: 4px 10px;
  background: transparent;
  <<box-shadow "none">>
}

nav.tc-menubar > .tc-menubar-narrow > ul.tc-menubar-list {
  padding: 4px 10px;
  background: <<colour page-background>>DD;
  <<box-shadow "none">>
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.tc-menubar-item > a,
.tc-menubar-item > button {
  opacity: 0.4;
  transition: all {{$:/config/AnimationDuration}}ms;
  border-radius: 0px;
  color: <<colour foreground>> !important;
  fill: <<colour foreground>> !important;
}

.tc-menubar-item > button svg {
  color: <<colour foreground>> !important;
  fill: <<colour foreground>> !important;
}

.tc-menubar-item > a:hover,
.tc-menubar-item > button:hover,
.tc-menubar-item > button.tc-selected {
  background: <<colour page-background>> !important;
  filter: contrast(70%);
  border-radius: 5px !important;
  opacity: 1;
}

.tc-menubar-item > button:hover svg,
.tc-menubar-item > button.tc-selected svg {
  background: transparent !important;
  filter: contrast(143%);
}
</$list>
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/style/Menubar.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/TiddlySeq/style/Menubar
